SpinG2 Class

Extends VectorN
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/math/SpinG2.ts:56
Module: math
Parent Module: EIGHT

Constructs a SpinG2 from a number[]. For a geometric implementation, use the static methods.

reflect

(
  • n
)
SpinG2 chainable

Defined in src/davinci-eight/math/SpinG2.ts:567

Sets this Spinor to the value of its reflection in the plane orthogonal to n. The geometric formula for bivector reflection is B' = n * B * n.

Parameters:

  • n VectorE2

Returns:

SpinG2:

this
